title: Senior Precision Optics Manufacturing Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work...
description:
- Develop and apply new surface form error compensation methods for freeform optics
- Work with suppliers to develop ultra-precision manufacturing capabilities and qualify new diamond turning processes
- Design features and processes to manufacture optical parts with aggressive intrinsic and extrinsic specifications
- Work closely with multi-functional teams, including optical designers, materials scientists, and manufacturing specialists, to achieve project objectives
- Communicate effectively with team members, providing technical expertise and updates at project milestones
- Travel to suppliers (up to 20%) to support engineering builds and help with failure analysis activities
key_qualifications:
Capable of diamond turning of freeform optics and operating optical metrology including interferometers, auto-collimators, microscopes, etc.
Familiar with MATLAB data processing to compensate optics form error
Track record of managing diamond turning continuous improvement efforts
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience
additional_requirements:
- Experience managing domestic and international optics vendors
- 8+ years of precision manufacturing experience in related fields
- A degree in Physics, Optical Sciences or Industrial Engineering
